message: “Any adult who intends to contact children for illicit purposes should live in fear that their crimes will be uncovered – and like Barreras, they will go to prison.” #helpERASE #ChildTrafficking

data.description: “This sentence demonstrates that no matter who you are, even a ranking official in the armed forces, you will be held accountable for preying on children."
data.title: DOJ: Kingsland Naval officer sentenced to over 5 years of federal prison after child sex-trafficking bust
